it said "Magicka has stopped working" what should I do?

Whenever I try to mount the iso file with ANY mounting program (I tried Damon tools Lite, Daemon tools Ultra), the program just keeps crashing. So whenever I try to mount it, the "Daemon Tools has stopped working" message appears. Something is seriously wrong with the iso file. Please help me!

Oh and also, I just noticed that I cant even open it with WinRAR or WinZIP or 7Zip. Every iso can be opened with winrar, except this one, i tested it and some other isos and a message appeared saying the iso is corrupt. Uploader, please check this, and see what you can do to fix it.
How i fix "stopped working" when i open the game?
Please help me, i cant do anything with the iso file. I cant open it with WinRAR, i cant mount it! UPLOADER, GODDAMNIT RESPOND ALREADY!!!
Mozes bez problema na Daemon Tools da mountujes. Everyone that has a problem starting the game, make sure to install XNA Framework 3.5!
